reg_info.act_under: Ontario Municipal Board Act   Loi sur la Commission des affaires municipales de l’Ontario

content.content:
1. The fees prescribed in the Schedules shall be paid to the Board in connection with the proceedings set out therein.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, s. 1. Schedule 1   Ontario Municipal Board Act 1.   Clause 54 (1) (c) — Floating indebtedness,     

      for any amount up to and including $50,000   $50.00 

      for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $50,000, up to and including $500,000   1.00 

      for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $500,000, up to and including $3,000,000    .50 

      for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $3,000,000, up to and including $5,000,000   .25 

      for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $5,000,000    .10 

  2.   Section 59 — Approval of debenture by-laws and certification of the validity of debentures,     

      for any amount up to and including $50,000   50.00 

      for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $50,000    1.00 

      maximum   1,000.00 

      extension for time for issuing debentures    50.00 

  3.   Section 64 — Dispensation of vote of electors   50.00 

  4.   Section 65 — Approval of undertakings, works, projects, schemes, acts, matters or things    (same as item 1) R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 1. Schedule 2   Assessment Appeals 1.   Residential and Farm Assessments     

      Main Roll Number   $50.00 

      Additional related Roll Number   each 10.00 

      Protective appeals: (Where appeal for previous year is pending before Board.)     

      Main Roll Number   25.00 

      Additional related Roll Number   each 10.00 

  2.   Other Assessments     

      Main Roll Number   125.00 

      Additional related Roll Number   each 25.00 R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 2. Schedule 3   Consent Appeals 1.   Consent Appeals    each $125.00 

  Note:   A reduced fee of $25 will apply to each additional consent appeal filed by the same appellant against connected consent applications. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 3. Schedule 4   Variance Appeals 1.   Variance Appeals   each $125.00 

  Note:   A reduced fee of $25 will apply to each additional variance appeal filed by the same appellant against connected variance applications. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 4. Schedule 5   Miscellaneous Proceedings not provided for in Schedules 1, 2, 3 and 4 for which no fee is prescribed by statute or regulation   $125.00 R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 5.

1. The fees prescribed in the Schedules shall be paid to the Board in connection with the proceedings set out therein.  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, s. 1.

Schedule 1
Ontario Municipal Board Act

1.

Clause 54 (1) (c) — Floating indebtedness,

 

 

for any amount up to and including $50,000

for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $50,000, up to and including $500,000

for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $500,000, up to and including $3,000,000

.50

 

for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $3,000,000, up to and including $5,000,000

.25

 

for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $5,000,000

.10

for any amount up to and including $50,000

for each additional $1,000 or fraction thereof in excess of $50,000

1.00

 

maximum

1,000.00

 

extension for time for issuing debentures

50.00

(same as item 1)

each 10.00

 

Protective appeals: (Where appeal for previous year is pending before Board.)

each 10.00

Schedule 3

1.

Consent Appeals

each $125.00

Note:

A reduced fee of $25 will apply to each additional consent appeal filed by the same appellant against connected consent applications.

 

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 3.

Schedule 4

Variance Appeals

each $125.00

Note:

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 888, Sched. 4.

Schedule 5
Miscellaneous

Proceedings not provided for in Schedules 1, 2, 3 and 4 for which no fee is prescribed by statute or regulation

$125.00
